issue.title: [CF 809] Time until x Energy available
issue.body:
Do you think it would be possible to make a condition (and lua condition) that can figure out the time till I have, say 50 energy available? So if i'm generating 10 energy per second and want the time till 50 energy available to be less than 2 seconds, I'd make a condition like "time till 50 energy <= 2 seconds" and this condition would always pass if I'm above 30 energy.

There's two issues with just making an icon for "energy >= 30". a) it doesn't take into account changing energy regeneration rates. b) I can't make something fancy like "time till 50 energy <= time till rupture fades" (which is where lua would come into play).


> Posted by CurseForge user AmeroGer | Imported from CurseForge issue #809 | Raw

comments.body:
Take a look at http://wow.curseforge.com/addons/tellmewhen/tickets/765-add-a-condition-energy-time-until-cap/

Time till 50 energy <= 2 seconds would look something like this:

``` ((50 - UnitPower("player")) / GetPowerRegen()) >= 2 ```

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Thanks alot. This should do exactly what I'd hoped for.


> Posted by CurseForge user AmeroGer

Sorry, just noticed I flipped the operator on that. Should be <= 2.
